news_header: McDonald's reported a slight revenue decline and stable EPS for Q4 2024.
news_original_title: Compared to Estimates, McDonald's (MCD) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
news_text: For the quarter ended December 2024, McDonald's (MCD) reported revenue of $6.39 billion, a decrease of 0.3% compared to the same period last year. The EPS was $2.83, down from $2.95 a year ago. The revenue fell short of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $6.46 billion by 1.16%. Although the EPS met the consensus estimate, investors are analyzing year-over-year changes to gauge financial health. Zacks also highlights a successful portfolio for 2025, with significant gains since 2012.
